replies.body: KYS can be one of those things that just isn't alright in any context whatsoever. If you need to talk about why this punishment was placed for things like that, you can always shoot our player behavior team a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).

Look, we all get mad, honestly I get it. Sadly, Riot can't really let this go, they kind of can't, due to a lot of reasons really.
It doesn't matter who started it, ended it or whatever, they will still ban for flame at the end of the day. The comments that pretty much got you the ben were probably the "Fucking kys" "just kys". It happens man, get over it.
Kill YourSelf- a word that has zero tolerance level in Riots word filter, that means if you use it ingame you have a VERY high chance to get suspended or banned
